pageContext.claim: “The city of Denver refused ICE’s request to turn over a criminal illegal alien charged with vehicular homicide for killing another driver in a horrific hit-and-run.”
pageContext.analysis: On March 10, Trump devoted his weekly address to sanctuary cities and illegal immigration. The Denver sheriff says this individual would have been turned over to ICE if not for a system error that allowed him to be released on bail. So the city of Denver did not "refuse" ICE's request, as Trump says.
